Articles.Content:
Hi,

I´d like to buy Making History, but everytime I click on "Purchase" button I´m redirected to other page on website, where are two half faces of kerbals, rocket, top of a planet and nothing else. Looks like a bug or something. There is nothing more, no words, no buttons, nothing. 
How I´m suppose to buy it?

Hi,

that´s me again. I´ve just found out that when I´m not logged in my acc things are little bit different. When I click on "Purchase" buttom, I´m correctly redirected on another page where are sell information (cost, quantity, promo code, etc..) and when I click on "Checkout" there pops out another window saing that I have to log in. After log in, page is blank again (again with backround of two faces, rocket and planet).
 
So, it happens only when I log into my acc. I wrote to support mail yesterday, but no response so far. Anybody knows what´s going on?
 
Thanks.
We are investigating the issue. Sorry for the inconvenience.

Hi,

I don´t know who did it, but now it works fine. Thanks anyway.

 

P.
